articles.title: U.S. Purpose in Pushing Forward "Biological Weapons Development Program" Disclosed
articles.content:
U.S. Purpose in Pushing Forward "Biological Weapons Development Program" Disclosed
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Director of Press of the Institute for American Studies (IFAS), Ministry of Foreign Affairs, DPRK made public the following statement on Wednesday:
					 Some U.S. media and experts are now groundlessly claiming that the DPRK is pushing forward with so-called "biological weapons development program" as a part of the "wild ambition for developing the WMD".
					
					 Properly speaking, it is the U.S. stereotyped method to cook up untruths as truths, stubbornly insisting that black is white and fabricating anything for satisfying their aggressive greed. And the U.S. itself is an empire of evils full of plots, fabrications, lies and deceptions. 
					
					 It is the U.S. that conducts military aggressions and cruise missile attacks on sovereign states in broad daylight while faking up "possession of WMD" and "use of chemical weapons" of those countries.
					
					 It is none other than the U.S., chattering on "morality" and "civilization", the criminal state that massacred the Korean people by bacteriological weapons during the Korean War and inflict sufferings upon the innocent people by continuing even now to openly use the internationally prohibited weapons.
					
					 The barbarous bacteriological atrocities perpetrated by the U.S. imperialist beasts during the Korean War still stand in relief in our people's memories.
					
					 And they are also the American politicians and the white supremacists making conceived attempts for state terrorism and racial extinction through overt research and development of the biological weapons in the worldwide-scattered U.S. laboratories.
					
					 It is the shameless deed that these criminals are finding fault with us while turning black into white by talking nonsense of the DPRK's "biological weapons development program". This is nothing but a manifestation of heinous intention to condemn our dignified state as a "rogue one" with the purpose to internationally isolate our highly dignified state and to justify the U.S. sanctions and pressure on the DPRK. This is also the manifestation of a pursuit for excuse to provoke nuclear war on the Korean peninsula at any cost.
					
					 The DPRK, as a state party to the BWC, maintains its consistent stand to oppose development, manufacture, stockpiling and possession of biological weapons.
					
					 The more the U.S. clings to the anti-DPRK stifling move, in such a manner as a thief shouting to stop thief, by denouncing us as a state of "developing the biological weapons", the more hardened the determination of our entire military personnel and people to take revenge will be and the earlier the days of destruction of the U.S., an empire of evils will come.

articles.title: Reception Held in Honor of DPRK Women Football Team Members
articles.content:
Reception Held in Honor of DPRK Women Football Team Members
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The National Sports Guidance Committee Wednesday hosted a reception at Okryu Restaurant in honor of the DPRK women football team who returned home after winning the title of the 2017 EAFF E-1 Football Championship.
					 Present at the reception were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea who doubles as chairman of the NSGC, Ri Ryong Nam, vice-premier of the Cabinet who doubles as chairman of the DPRK Football Association, Kim Il Guk, minister of Physical Culture and Sports, Kim Jang San, secretary general of the DPRK FA, officials concerned, women footballers, coaches and their families.
					
					 Choe Hwi said in his congratulatory speech that the success registered by the women footballers is greatly encouraging all the service personnel and people who came out in the all-out onward campaign for wining the final victory in building a socialist power true to the Party's guidance.
					
					 He called upon the footballers and coaches to redouble their efforts, bearing in their mind the Party's trust and the people's expectation and create a fresh legendary story at international games.
					
					 Chief Coach Kim Kwang Min and footballer Kim Nam Hui said in their replies that their recent success is utterly attributable to the love and trust by the Party which has taken warm care of sportspersons and led them to a shortcut to the sports powerhouse in every aspect.
					
					 They expressed their determination to firmly prepare for men and women strong in ideology, spirit, physical body and technique, bearing in mind their duty as revolutionary sportspersons and make sure that the flag of the DPRK flies higher at international games.

articles.title: Reception Hosted by Vietnamese Embassy
articles.content:
Reception Hosted by Vietnamese Embassy
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Pham Viet Hung, Vietnamese ambassador to the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, and Nguyen Quoc Viet, military attach√© of the Vietnamese Embassy here, hosted a reception at the Taedonggang Diplomatic Club Wednesday to mark the Army Day of Vietnam.
					 Present there on invitation were generals and officers of the Korean People's Army, officials concerned and representatives and military attaches of embassies of different countries here.
					
					 Members of the Vietnamese Embassy here were on hand.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The participants in the 5th Conference of Cell Chairpersons of the Workers' Party of Korea on Wednesday visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill.
					 They laid a floral basket and bouquets before the statues and paid tribute to the great leaders.

articles.title: Wreaths Laid at Grave of Patriotic Martyr Ri Jin Gyu
articles.content:
Wreaths Laid at Grave of Patriotic Martyr Ri Jin Gyu
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Wreaths were placed at the grave of Ri Jin Gyu, former first vice-chairman of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan (Chongryon), at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery in Sinmi-ri on Wednesday on the occasion of the centenary of his birth.
					 Seen there was a wreath from respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 Present at the wreath-laying ceremony were Kim Yong Chol, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Kim Yong Dae, vice-president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly, officials concerned, the bereaved family members and officials of Chongryon on a visit to the socialist homeland.
					
					 Laid at the grave were wreaths, together with bouquets, in the names of the Presidium of the SPA of the DPRK, the Chongryon Central Standing Committee, the Committee for Aiding Overseas Compatriots of Korea and the Overseas Koreans' Affairs Administration.
					
					 The participants observed a moment's silence in the memory of Ri Jin Gyu, who devoted his all to developing the movement of Koreans in Japan and the homeland's prosperity, remaining faithful to the idea and leadership of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.

articles.title: "2017 Report on Human Rights Abuses in South Korea" Issued
articles.content:
"2017 Report on Human Rights Abuses in South Korea" Issued
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The National Reunification Institute of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea Wednesday issued the "2017 Report on Human Rights Abuses in south Korea" to reveal the hideous crimes against humanity and human rights committed in south Korea this year.
					 The report deals with sad lot of the south Korean people who fell victim to the U.S. colonial rule.
					
					 Military exercises are staged almost everyday in the military bases of the U.S. including a shooting range of Yongphyong and therefore the south Korean people are trembling with horror under the noise pollution and various accidents and their living places have been devastated.
					
					 South Korea suffers great economic damage owing to the U.S. policy for plunder.
					
					 Crimes against humanity such as murder, rape, violence and robbery committed by GIs present in south Korea steadily increase.
					
					 The report points to the violated democratic rights and the life of south Koreans in dire destitution.
					
					 The south Korean people of every stratum demanded the reinstatement of democratic freedom and right, strongly calling for releasing the prisoners of conscience who fell victim to the fascist misrule of traitor Park Geun Hye's group and canceling the measure to outlaw the Teachers Union of south Korea (Jongyojo) after the change of the regime.
					
					 Nevertheless, the south Korean authorities resisted the south Koreans' demand for legalizing Jongyojo reiterating the sophism of conservative forces that "there is concern over negative effect on the people" and repelled the issue of prisoners of conscience, spouting that "they can't take amnesty measure to earn fame" and "the conservatives might call for Park's release."
					
					 In the long run, a former law maker from the Unified Progressive Party, the chairman of the south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions and many other prisoners of conscience are still behind bars though they were detained for no reason under Park's regime.
					
					 The report held that a fierce wind of confrontation with fellow countrymen rampant in south Korea has been accompanied with violation of human rights.
					
					 When the puppet authorities talked as if they could make a fresh change in favor of improvement of inter-Korean relations, the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy in south Korea and other progressive bodies demanded the present regime immediately send back Kim Ryon Hui and other DPRK women employees who suffered from the policy of confrontation of the puppet conservatives saying that this was a foremost task facing the regime for the sake of reconciliation and unity of the nation and to recover the downtrodden human rights and democracy.
					
					 But, the puppet Ministry of Unification hurt heart of Kim Ryon Hui who demanded repatriation by saying that it had to conduct repatriation movement worrying about her family members in the north. 
					
					 Meanwhile, it openly sent a statement branding the abduction of women employees of the north as "defection from the north by their own wills" to the civic and public organizations. Not content with this, it committed thrice-cursed immoral crime by cooking up a new plot of "marriage" to detain them in south Korea.
					
					 The south Korean authorities wantonly abuse the desire and wishes of south Korean people for national reconciliation, unity and peace and reunification.
					
					 The puppet conservative group wrapped in premonition of last destruction by the great candlelight action lightening south Korea suppressed south Koreans from all walks of life who demanded for justice and improvement of the north-south relations labeling them as "pro-north left faction" and "forces following the north" on the charge of violation of the "security law" to tide over the crisis.
					
					 What is more enraging is that such fascist suppression is still going on in south Korea even after the change of the regime.
					
					 The report referred to the fact that the south Korean puppet army, colonial mercenary army of the U.S., is the exhibition of human rights abuses with the most grave problems.
					
					 Serious human losses occur one after another by the war exercises against the north and the number of officers and soldiers of the puppet army claim for discharge expressing mental diseases in fear of war and accidental death mushrooms.
					
					 American barrack culture has been deeply infiltrated into the south Korean puppet army and Yankee culture prevails and it regards brutality and atrocity as the first character of soldiers. Thereby violence serves as the basic mean and common life mode to maintain the army.
					
					 The situation of servicewomen in the puppet army is more miserable. 
					
					 The human rights issue of south Korea can never be solved as long as the U.S. colonial domination and occupation exist and the puppet authorities' pro-U.S. sycophancy and policy of confrontation with the compatriots and unpopular rule continue in south Korea.

articles.title: National Art Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Art Exhibition Opens
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- A national art exhibition opened with due ceremony at the Korean Art Gallery on Wednesday in commemoration of the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Among the art pieces on display in the venue of the exhibition is a picture depicting Kim Jong Suk who is protecting President Kim Il Sung at the risk of her life.
					
					 The art pieces show the revolutionary life of Kim Jong Suk who faithfully upheld the idea and leadership of the President as his lifeguard.
					
					 They make visitors remember the feats of Kim Jong Suk who always protected the President everywhere at the risk of her life, upholding him as the sun of the nation.
					
					 Some pieces represent the image of Kim Jong Suk who devoted tireless efforts to upholding the President's line for building the party, state and army right after the liberation of Korea.
					
					 There are also art pieces showing the feats of the heroine of Mt Paektu who provided the Korean people with sure guarantee for steadily carrying forward the Juche revolution being blessed by the illustrious leaders down through generations.
					
					 On display there are about 200 art pieces showing true picture of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea where the wishes of the heroine of Mt Paektu come true under the guidance of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 Present at the opening ceremony were Pak Kwang Ho, vice-chairman of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, An Tong Chun, chairman of the C.C., General Federation of the Unions of Art and Literature of Korea, officials concerned, officials and creators in the field of art, Pyongyangites and youth and students.

articles.title: Art Performance Given
articles.content:
Art Performance Given
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League on Wednesday gave a performance at the Central Youth Hall to mark the centenary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk's birth.
					 Among the audience were Choe Hwi, vice-chairman of the C.C., Workers' Party of Korea, Pak Chol Min, first-secretary of the C.C., Kimilsungist-Kimjongilist Youth League, and other officials of the youth league and youth and students.
					
					 Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as narration and song "The General Is the Destiny of Korea" and light music and song and dance "Song of Women's Emancipation".
					
					 The performers impressively represented the revolutionary career of Kim Jong Suk.
					
					 They sonorously sang the boundless honor and happiness of the Korean youth upholding in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is adding eternal luster to the noble tradition of the Korean youth movement, which was created under the care of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					 Agitation poem and chorus "Glory to General Kim Jong Un" and other numbers vividly reflected the iron faith and will of the youths to defend the Supreme Leader unto death and to win the final victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the Party's leadership.

articles.title: North Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum Opens
articles.content:
North Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum Opens
Chongjin, December 20 (KCNA) -- The North Hamgyong Provincial Revolutionary Museum was remodeled.
					 The opening ceremony of the revolutionary museum took place on Wednesday. 
					
					 Present at the ceremony were officials of the party and power bodies and working people's organizations, shock brigade members and other people in the province.
					
					 Ri Yong Nam, vice-chairman of the North Hamgyong Provincial Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, made an opening address.
					
					 He said respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un saw to it that the revolutionary museum was remodeled at the best level.
					
					 He underscored the need to bear in mind the confidence that we are sure to win thanks to the respected Supreme Leader and protect him politico-ideologically at the risk of lives and faithfully uphold the Party's idea and leadership.
					
					 He called upon officials, Party members and other working people in the province to make an all-out effort to carry out the decisions of the Seventh Congress of the WPK, closely united around Kim Jong Un, so as to bring about a new upsurge in the building of a powerful socialist country.

articles.title: Women of Missions of Int'l Organizations Here Visit Footwear Factory
articles.content:
Women of Missions of Int'l Organizations Here Visit Footwear Factory
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Women of foreign embassies and missions of the international organizations here on Wednesday toured the Ryuwon Footwear Factory to commemorate the centenary of birth of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Being briefed on the fact that the factory turned into an icon of the shoe-making industry of the DPRK, the guests went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history, the room dedicated to the history of the factory, the integrated production control room, etc.

articles.title: Nyomaeng-Brand Artillery Pieces Presented
articles.content:
Nyomaeng-Brand Artillery Pieces Presented
Hamhung, December 20 (KCNA) -- A presentation ceremony of "Nyomaeng"-brand artillery pieces provided by organizations of the women's union took place at the square of Hamhung on Wednesday on the threshold of the centenary of birth of anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk. 
					 Present at the ceremony were officials concerned, service personnel and officials and members of the women's union in Hamhung City.
					
					 Jang Chun Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the Socialist Women's Union of Korea, made an address.
					
					 She said that President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il built a self-reliant and modern defense industry, overcoming unprecedented trials in the van and provided a powerful military guarantee for the country's sovereignty and prosperity of the nation.
					
					 She referred to the fact that Kim Jong Suk worked heart and soul for bolstering the revolutionary armed forces and founding the defense industry and thus performed the exploits to be recorded long in the history of building the Juche-oriented army.
					
					 She said that the DPRK greets a heyday of bolstering its military power as it holds in high esteem respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un who is giving a steady continuity to the exploits performed by the peerlessly great men in building the Juche-oriented army.
					
					 She called upon all officials and members of the union to fulfill their duty in the campaign for winning the final victory in the showdown with the imperialists and the U.S. true to the guidance of Kim Jong Un.
					
					 A certificate of presentation was handed to an official of the Ministry of the People's Armed Forces.
					
					 Then followed speeches.

articles.title: Achievements Made in Light Industry of DPRK
articles.content:
Achievements Made in Light Industry of DPRK
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The DPRK has directed efforts to putting the light industry on a Juche and modern basis this year and thus made many achievements conducive to the improvement of people's living.
					 Though the U.S. and its followers have remained persistent in their moves to stifle the DPRK by adding raw materials and equipment to the sanctions list, technicians and workers in the field of light industry have strived to put the production on a normal basis, regarding the self-reliance and self-development as the lifeline for the development of light industry.
					
					 The Pyongyang Kim Jong Suk Textile Mill set up a workshop to produce cellular fabrics necessary for making consumer goods like bag, sportswear and shoes.
					
					 The Pyongyang Rayon Factory began producing tetron rayon and created the capacity of producing thousands tons of reclaimed rayon per year with waste yarn from various textile mills.
					
					 Completed in the textile and knitting industrial fields were technical preparations for making use of vinalon and polypropylene plastic fiber produced by the February 8 Vinalon Complex and Namhung Youth Chemical Complex.
					
					 The Pyongyang Wheat Flour Processing Factory, Pyongyang Condiments Factory, Sonhung Foodstuff Factory and other factories established various production processes with their own efforts to regularize the production of scores of kinds of functional and natural foodstuffs for the improvement of people's health and dietary life.
					
					 The 28th National Exhibition of Consumer Goods held in October served as an occasion to show well the aspects of light industry developing in the spirit of self-reliance and self-development.
					
					 All the achievements made this year inspire technicians and workers in the field of light industry with the firm faith that the believe in their own strength will surely bring about a radical turn in their efforts to put the light industry on a higher Juche and modern basis and rapidly improve the people's livelihood.

articles.title: Japan's Bid to Have Access to Capability for Preemptive Attack Denounced
articles.content:
Japan's Bid to Have Access to Capability for Preemptive Attack Denounced
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Japanese reactionaries are working hard to purchase long-range attack missiles for fighters from the U.S. and Norway while talking about "access to capability to strike missile base of the DPRK". The types are the U.S.-made JASSM-ER and the Norway-developed Joint Strike. JASSM-ER will go for F-15 fighters of the Japan "Air Self-Defense Force" and Joint Strike for F-35 Stealth fighters.
					 Rodong Sinmun Wednesday in a commentary terms this a reckless action of the militarist maniacs to realize the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-Prosperity Sphere" at any cost by turning the Japan  SDF into full forces for a preemptive attack. 
					
					 It goes on:
					
					 The crafty intention of the Japanese reactionaries has become clearer as they are confusing the mentality of Trump who have lost the elementary ability to discern things under the pretext of the DPRK's "nuclear and missile threat" and escalating the crisis on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 The Japanese ultra-right reactionaries are no more than the foolish gamblers crazy enough to stake the future of their country and the fate of its people on poor motive.
					
					 The right-wing conservative forces of the island country are going reckless, not properly understanding the military might of the DPRK to put the whole mainland of the U.S. beyond Japan under complete control. But they should bear in mind that the preemptive attack upon the DPRK will lead to the total defeat of Japan.

articles.title: Japan's Reinvasion Ambition May Lead It to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
Japan's Reinvasion Ambition May Lead It to Ruin: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Japan Prime Minister Abe at the recent budget committee of the House of Councilors voiced his opinion to refer the existence of "Self-defence Forces" to article 9 of constitution and tolerate the exercise of the right to "collective self-defence".
					 This full-fledged revelation of the Japanese reactionaries to revive militarism constitutes a serious threat to the peace in the region and the rest of the world.
					
					 The military fanatics' ambition for reinvasion has now reached the phase which can no longer be overlooked.
					
					 Abe who set it as a goal to make Japan a "country capable of fighting a war" away from the postwar system which binds the country, has gone crafty enough to use such leverage as the exercise of the "right to collective self-defence".
					
					 In 2013 Japan adopted "state security strategy" as the first thing in Japan's political history and called for making "more active contribution" to peace and stability of the international community based on positive pacifism, thereby shaping a legal framework for theoretically supporting the exercise of the "right to collective self-defence".
					
					 In April 2015, it revised the "U.S.-Japan defence cooperation guidelines" which designated the distribution of cooperation and roles concerning the operation, information and logistic support for the U.S. forces and "Self-defence Forces" in case of emergency after the lapse of 18 years, thereby expanding the scope of overseas military operation of the SDF to all directions.
					
					 In September 2015 Japan packaged eleven security bills for legally supporting the "U.S.-Japan defence cooperation guidelines" to adopt a "law on security" and put it into official effect from March 29, 2016.
					
					 Accordingly the SDF was invested with the right to conduct military operational duty in any area of the world under the pretext of the exercise of "right to collective self-defence".
					
					 What left to be done by the Japanese reactionary ruling forces who are pursuing overseas aggression now is to retrogressively revise the "pacifist constitution" and secure "validity" and "legitimacy" of the moves for becoming a military giant and launching overseas aggression.
					
					 A foreign media expressed concerns long ago that "the issue of collective self-defence is just an appetizer for the main course of constitutional revision for Abe".
					
					 At an event marking the 70th anniversary of the enforcement of constitution of Japan Abe said "the present constitution has to be modified as the security environment has undergone a change due to the north's nuclear and missile development". It is clear that this was aimed to create a pretext for constitutional revision and create an excuse for overseas advance of the SDF.
					
					 The wild act of the Japanese right-wing forces led by Abe is leading the Japanese archipelago to the danger line.
					
					 To look back on history, all Japan's aggression attempts at Korean peninsula and the Asian continent ended in bitter defeat and left wound that is hardly healable even to the Japanese people. 
					
					 Japan has to draw a serious lesson from its past history of aggression.
					
					 If the present ruling quarters of Japan follow in the footsteps of the predecessors, not waking up from the old dream of the "Greater East Asia Co-prosperity Sphere", they will only face final ruin.

articles.title: Final Victory Is in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Final Victory Is in Store for DPRK: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article that final victory is in store for the Democratic People's Republic of Korea as it holds respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					 The article discloses the fact that the U.S. openly reveals its intention to stifle the DPRK militarily and is making desperate efforts to put it into practice.
					
					 It says:
					
					 Even though the U.S. imperialists make desperate efforts, they can never escape from the destiny of ruin.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK did not flinch when the worst situation prevailed on the Korean peninsula.
					
					 Respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un, the peerless and illustrious commander with iron-willed grit and pluck, stands at the helm of revolution. They have their single-minded unity, the life and soul of Juche Korea and driving force for rapid progress. They have the most powerful nuclear deterrence.
					
					 They have smashed the enemies' sanctions and pressure with an all-people and all-out death defying campaign with the firm faith that final victory is in store for them as they hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					 The service personnel and people of the DPRK who have everything regard the U.S. imperialists' reckless hysteria as the last-ditch effort of those doomed to ruin. The DPRK will more firmly grasp the powerful self-defensive deterrence and reliably defend regional peace and stability.
					
					 The article stresses that the DPRK will become the victor in the showdown with U.S. imperialists and the U.S. become the loser.

articles.title: Invincible Is DPRK Advancing with Its Own Strength: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Invincible Is DPRK Advancing with Its Own Strength: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea have successively made great auspicious events of significance in the history of the nation and proud achievements this year in the vigorous drive for the victory of socialism through the do-or-die struggle against the imperialist reactionary forces despite big difficulties, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in an article.
					 It goes on:
					
					 The dignity and might of self-developing socialist Korea have been fully demonstrated over the world and the politico-ideological and physical strength has been increased in every way under the harshest ordeals unprecedented in the world.
					
					 Through the grave struggle and great victory this year the Korean people enshrined once again the precious truth that the strength of self-reliance is stronger than sanctions and pressure by the hostile forces and the final victory is in store for socialist Korea led by the great Party.

articles.title: S. Korean Warmongers Are Bound to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
S. Korean Warmongers Are Bound to Go to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Days ago, south Korean warmongers together with U.S. and Japanese forces conducted again a missile warning drill in the waters off the Korean Peninsula. Warships of the Navies of south Korea and the U.S. and Japan Maritime "Self-Defense Force" were involved in the drill in which the war maniacs detected and monitored simulated targets and shared information about it. This is a deliberate provocation aggravating the tense situation on the Korean Peninsula and the region, Rodong Sinmun Wednesday says in a commentary.
					 It goes on:
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that the missile warning drill was the actual maneuvers to hasten the establishment of the U.S.-led tri-angular military alliance for aggression.
					
					 The missile warning drill of the U.S., Japan and south Korea is the main key to establishing the tri-angular military alliance.
					
					 South Korea's active participation in the drill with Japan dancing to the tune of the U.S. clearly proves that the establishment of the triangular military alliance is becoming a reality.
					
					 South Korea's earnest joining in the moves for the triangular military alliance at the instigation of the master is the foolish act of precipitating self-destruction. The traitors running amuck in the moves to ignite a war depending on the outside forces cannot but meet a miserable fiasco.

articles.title: DPRK Will Strongly Counteract U.S. Racket for Confrontation: Minju Joson
articles.content:
DPRK Will Strongly Counteract U.S. Racket for Confrontation: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The U.S. recently staged combined air exercises with south Korea after massively introducing such strategic assets as B-1B and F-22 Raptor and F-35 in the wake of which it again staged a missile warning drill with Japan and south Korea. The enemies do not hide that the recent joint drill is aimed to strengthen tripartite cooperation in fields like rocket tracking and information sharing.
					 Commenting on this, Minju Joson Wednesday says this has proved that the U.S. and its vassal forces have gone desperate in their efforts to form the triangular military alliance for aggression and strengthen it under the pretext of "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK.
					
					 The U.S. is keen on the policy for military confrontation on the Korean Peninsula in defiance of the unanimous concerns of the international community. This is aimed to maintain and strengthen the military hegemony in the region and create conditions favorable for carrying out the strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 The U.S. regards the triangular military alliance involving Japan and south Korea as one of the essential elements for executing the strategy for dominating Asia-Pacific. Its intention is that it has to build the triangular military alliance in order to hold unchallenged edge in the military confrontation with the potential rivals and to establish the domination in the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					 What is all the more serious is that the U.S. is considering it as one of the important strategic duties to be carried out by the alliance to stifle the DPRK by force.
					
					 There can never be any other way of containing it under the condition where the U.S. has gone desperate to seize the sovereignty, right to existence and development.
					
					 We will take strong countermeasures for the sovereignty of the country, dignity of the nation and peace on the Korean peninsula and the region and thus deal a telling blow on the U.S. and its vassal forces.

articles.title: S. Korea's Sanctions Racket Is "Tribute" Offered by Colonial Stooge: Minju Joson
articles.content:
S. Korea's Sanctions Racket Is "Tribute" Offered by Colonial Stooge: Minju Joson
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Recently the south Korean puppet authorities announced that they would designate organizations including financial bodies and shipping companies and individuals of the DPRK as additional targets of independent sanctions ahead of their chief executive's visit to China.
					 A commentary of Minju Joson Wednesday says the south Korean authorities staged another racket of "independent sanctions" in the wake of the similar one last month, stressing this glaringly discloses the despicable nature for confrontation of the group of traitors to the nation.
					
					 The racket of "additional sanctions" does not deserve even a passing note as it is just a superficial one, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 Neither enemies' high-intensity sanctions nor pressure could stop the DPRK from advancing full of vigor along the path of independent and simultaneous development of two fronts.
					
					 However, the puppet authorities raised the proposal for "independent sanctions" while talking about "strong countermeasure to north's provocation" and "danger over dealings with the north". This is another intolerable politically-motivated provocation against the DPRK. Such an act has to be called into question as it is a vicious challenge to the expectation of the public at home and abroad for the overhaul of the north-south relations and the detente of the situation on the Korean peninsula which has reached the point explosion. 
					
					 The racket for "independent sanctions" is just a farce of "tribute" offered by a colonial stooge.
					
					 The puppet authorities are devoid of any means and way to put sanctions on the DPRK. It is really foolhardy for them to talk about "independent sanctions" under such situation.

articles.title: S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Inciting Confrontation under Fire
articles.content:
S. Korean Chief Executive's Remarks Inciting Confrontation under Fire
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean chief executive called to Chongwadae the heads of puppet military who took part in the meeting of major commanding officers of the army and there he reeled off such rubbish as "attainment of unchallenged power", "definite deterrence" and "powerful army", while saying that the "nuclear and missile threats" from the DPRK have become serious and realistic. He also urged his confidants to put into practice the new measure for missile development pursuant to the revised missile guidelines with the U.S., step up the acquisition and development of ultra-modern military hardware and thus build earlier the "three-axis strike system".
					 A commentary of Rodong Sinmun Wednesday denounces his rhetoric as an agitation of extreme hostility toward the fellow countrymen and an act of hurling the puppet warmongers into military confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					 Recently the south Korean chief executive described the measures for self-defence taken by the DPRK to cope with the nuclear threat and blackmail from the U.S. as "threat" only to reveal the dirty habit of challenging whatever his fellow countrymen in the north do while finding fault with them for no justifiable reason, the paper says, and goes on:
					
					 No matter how desperately the puppet warmongers may try while talking about "unchallenged power" and "definite deterrence", they can never change their deplorable fate as war servants of the U.S. but will further plunge into quagmire. They have to clearly understand this.
					
					 Minju Joson in a commentary Wednesday jeers at the south Korean chief executive who parrots anti-DPRK confrontation rhetoric while pinning hope on thick-headed man like Trump.

articles.title: S. Korean Organizations Demand Proper Labor Policy
articles.content:
S. Korean Organizations Demand Proper Labor Policy
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The south Korean Confederation of Trade Unions held a press conference near the Chongwadae in denunciation of the authorities' moves for the retrogressive revision of the "Labor Standards Act" on Dec. 14, south Korean internet paper Chamsesang said.
					 Meanwhile, the south Korean Federation of Trade Unions on Dec. 13 made public a statement urging the "National Assembly" to primarily adopt the "draft amendment to the law on builders". 
					
					 The statement said the present chief executive broke the election commitments and it is the betrayal and mockery of the workers and other people.

articles.title: Tragedy of Four Newborn Infants in S. Korea
articles.content:
Tragedy of Four Newborn Infants in S. Korea
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Four newborn infants successively died at a hospital of Ehwa Woman's University on Dec. 16, according to the south Korean KBS.
					 Their parents call for clarifying the cause of the deaths saying that the hospital side did not take proper measures.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Introduced by Nigerian Paper
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The Nigerian newspaper Nigerian Observer on Dec. 12 carried the gist of respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un's work "Let Us Step Up the Building of a Thriving Country by Applying Kim Jong Il's Patriotism" to commemorate the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il.
					 The work, published on July 26, Juche 101 (2012), deals with the essence of Kim Jong Il's patriotism and his noble life dedicated to the country and its people.
					
					 It also clarifies the important matters arising in applying Kim Jong Il's patriotism.

articles.title: Events on DPRK Held Abroad
articles.content:
Events on DPRK Held Abroad
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Events took place in different countries on the occasion of the sixth anniversary of demise of leader Kim Jong Il and the 26th anniversary of his assumption of the supreme commandership of the Korean People's Army, the sixth anniversary of Kim Jong Un's assumption of the KPA supreme commandership and the 100th birth anniversary of the anti-Japanese war heroine Kim Jong Suk.
					 Round-table talks, lectures, book and photo exhibitions and film shows were held in Angola, Nigeria, Hungary and Austria from Nov. 20 to Dec. 4.
					
					 Displayed at the venues of the events were photos dealing with the exploits of President Kim Il Sung, leader Kim Jong Il and respected Supreme Leader Kim Jong Un.
					
					 There were also their works and books and photos introducing the reality in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					 Present there were personages of various strata and masses of those countries.
					
					 The international secretary of the Angolan Women's Organization said that the Korean people are blessed with illustrious leaders down through generations, adding it is thanks to the outstanding leaders that the Korean people could advance along the road chosen by themselves without a slight deviation firmly defending the country's sovereignty and dignity even under the present complex international situation.
					
					 The DPRK's military muscle which was built up under the leadership of Kim Jong Il and consolidated in every way under the guidance of Kim Jong Un is reliably guaranteeing the happy life of the Korean people.
					
					 The chairman of the Hungarian Workers' Party and other speakers stressed that Kim Jong Il protected socialism with his unique Songun politics and Kim Jong Un is wisely leading the struggle for building a powerful socialist state.
					
					 The chairman of the Solidarity Committee of Unionists for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea in Austria noted that he took part in the 5th International Festival in Praise of the Great Persons of Mt Paektu and he once again realized the boundless reverence of the progressive mankind for the heaven-sent great men.

articles.title: DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire Lauded by South African Body
articles.content:
DPRK's Successful ICBM Test-fire Lauded by South African Body
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- The successful test-fire of ICBM Hwasong-15 conducted by the Democratic People's Republic of Korea was a priceless victory won by the Korean people, great and heroic, by invariably implementing the line of simultaneously developing the two fronts set forth by the Workers' Party of Korea despite the vicious challenge of the U.S. imperialists and their vassal forces and manifold hardships.
					 The Mfumalanga Provincial Group for the Study of the Juche Idea of South Africa said this in a statement on Dec. 8.
					
					 The statement went on:
					
					 The DPRK's development and progress of strategic weapons is to defend its sovereignty from the nuclear threat of the U.S. imperialists.
					
					 The DPRK's great success will shine forever along with the victorious advance of the cause of human independence as it put an end to the imperialists' invasion and nuclear threat.
					
					 We warmly congratulate the DPRK on its successful ICBM test-fire.
					
					 We extend firm support and solidarity to the Korean people in their struggle for protecting the global peace and security.

articles.title: Nigerian, Nepalese Personages Assail U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
articles.content:
Nigerian, Nepalese Personages Assail U.S. Hostile Policy towards DPRK
Pyongyang, December 20 (KCNA) -- Nigerian and Nepali personages issued statements on Nov. 29 in denunciation of the U.S. high-handed re-designation of the DPRK as "a state sponsor of terrorism."
					 The administrative secretary of the People's Progressive Party of Nigeria referred to the fact that Trump designated the DPRK again as "a state sponsor of terrorism" after crying out for "totally exterminating" the Korean people in the UN arena, condemning it as a grave provocation against the world progressives and conscience and a blatant violation of their rights.
					
					 He went on:
					
					 I positively support the DPRK principled stand that it will further bolster up the deterrent for defending the sovereignty and the rights to existence and development to cope with the extremely vicious hostile policy toward the DPRK and nuclear threat that have lasted for more than half a century and that it will sincerely fulfill the nuclear non-proliferation obligation as a responsible nuclear weapons state.
					
					 The DPRK measures for self-defense are quite just as they are aiming at ensuring the peace and security of the Korean peninsula and the region. I appeal to the world to become vocal from the point of view of a fair deal.
					
					 Manju Ratna Sakya, chairman of the Nepal Journalist Association, blasted the U.S. for its re-designation of the DPRK as "a state sponsor of terrorism" without any ground.
					
					 The world progressives are becoming critical of the U.S. which cooked up the "sanctions resolutions" against the DPRK, he said, praising the efforts of the DPRK for the world peace.

articles.title: Un funcionario de cancilleria coreana refuta el rumor de "desarrollo de armas biologicas" de la RPDC
articles.content:
Un funcionario de cancilleria coreana refuta el rumor de "desarrollo de armas biologicas" de la RPDC
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El director de prensa del Instituto para Asuntos Norteamericanos del Ministerio de Relaciones Exteriores de la RPDC hizo publica el dia 20 una declaracion como sigue:
					En estos dias, unos medios de prensa y especialistas de EE.UU. divulgan el rumor infundado de que la RPDC da acicate al "desarrollo de armas biologicas" como parte de su "ambicion de desarrollo de armas de exterminio masivo".
					
					Es un metodo rutinario del pais norteamericano que convierte lo blanco en lo negro para satisfacer su ambicion de agresion.
					
					EE.UU. es el imperio de males lleno de intrigas y fraudes, mentiras y enganos. Y tambien no vacila en cometer la agresion militar y el golpe con los misiles cruceros contra los estados soberanos bajo pretextos inventados de la "posesion de armas de exterminio masivo" y el "uso de armas quimicas".
					
					Es precisamente EE.UU., que preconiza la "moralidad" y la "civilizacion", el pais criminal que masacro a los habitantes coreanos con las armas bacteriologicas durante la guerra coreana de la decada de los 50 e impone hoy tambien penalidades a los inocentes al usar abiertamente los armamentos internacionalmente prohibidos.
					
					Hasta la fecha, el pueblo coreano recuerda vividamente los crimenes de guerra bacteriologica cometidos por los bestias yanquis durante la pasada contienda coreana.
					
					Son precisamente los politiqueros y los partidarios de supremacia de raza blanca de EE.UU. los tipejos que desarrollan las armas biologicas en los laboratorios instalados por doquier del mundo, por una parte y por la otra, traman el terrorismo estatal y el extermino de la raza humana.
					
					Por tanto, las insistencias arriba mencionadas de los yanquis devienen un acto cinico.
					
					Como pais signatario del BWC, la RPDC mantiene invariablemente la posicion opuesta al desarrollo y produccion de armas biologicas, su almacenamiento y su posesion.
					
					La acusacion de EE.UU. a la RPDC es la expresion de su malsana intencion de aislar internacionalmente a la digna RPDC poniendole la gorra de "bribon" y racionalizar su sancion y presion anti-RPDC, y tiene por objeto preparar los pretextos necesarios para desatar cueste lo que cueste la guerra nuclear en la Peninsula Coreana.
					
					Por mas que EE.UU. se recurra con frenesi a la campana de presion anti-RPDC describiendola como "desarrolladora de armas biologicas", tal imprudencia redoblara la revancha de los uniformados y civiles coreanos y adelantara mas el arruinamiento de EE.UU., imperio de males.

articles.title: Se ofrece banquete en honor de ganadoras del Campeonato de Futbol E-1
articles.content:
Se ofrece banquete en honor de ganadoras del Campeonato de Futbol E-1
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes ofrecio este miercoles en el Restaurante Okryu un banquete en honor de las futbolistas ganadoras del Campeonato E-1 de la Federacion de las Asociaciones de Futbol del Este de Asia de 2017.
					Estuvieron presentes en la recepcion Choe Hwi, vicepresidente del Comite Central del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y presidente del Comite Estatal de Direccion de Deportes, Ri Ryong Nam, vicepremier y presidente de la Asociacion de Futbol de la RPDC, Kim Il Guk, ministro de Deportes, Kim Jang San, secretario general de la Asociacion de Futbol de la RPDC, los funcionarios interesados, las jugadoras y los entrenadores y sus familiares. 
					
					Al hacer uso de la palabra de felicitacion, Choe Hwi dijo que el exito alcanzado por las futbolistas estimula mucho a todos los militares y civiles del pais, levantados en la ofensiva general para lograr la victoria final en la construccion de una potencia prospera bajo la guia del Partido.
					
					Llamo a las jugadoras y entrenadores a crear con el animo redoblado nuevos mitos deportivos en las competencias internacionales en correspondencia a la confianza del Partido y la esperanza del pueblo.
					
					El entrenador-jefe Kim Kwang Min y la jugadora Kim Nam Hui pronunciaron discursos de respuesta. 
					
					Ellos senalaron que pudieron triunfar en el mencionado campeonato gracias al amor y confianza del Partido que dirige atentamente a los deportistas hacia la meta de potencia deportiva. 
					
					Manifestaron la decision de prepararse como deportistas revolucionarios fuertes en lo ideo-espiritual y en lo fisico y tecnico para colocar la bandera nacional a lo mas alto del asta en las competencias internacionales.

articles.title: IRP publica reporte de investigacion sobre la violacion de DDHH en el Sur de Corea
articles.content:
IRP publica reporte de investigacion sobre la violacion de DDHH en el Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- El Instituto de la Reunificacion de la Patria (IRP) hizo publico el dia 20 el "reporte de investigacion sobre la violacion de derechos humanos en el Sur de Corea de 2017" que enumera los peores crimenes antieticos y anti-DDHH reportados este ano en el suelo surcoreano.
					El documento se refiere a la tragica situacion en que vive la poblacion surcoreana siendo victima del dominio colonial de EE.UU.
					
					Se escuchan casi todos los dias las detonaciones en las bases militares norteamericanas como el campo de tiro de Yongphyong, debido a lo cual los habitantes surcoreanos sufren las perdidas acusticas y los accidentes de diferentes tipos, comienza el texto y prosigue:
					
					Ademas, se contaminan seriamente los terrenos en que ellos viven de generacion en generacion.
					
					Por otra parte, causa colosales perdidas economicas la politica de saqueo colonial de EE.UU.
					
					Se incrementa de continuo el numero de los crimenes antieticos de toda indole cometidos por los uniformados yanquis en suelo surcoreano como asesinato, violacion sexual, uso de violencia, extorsion, etc.
					
					Se violan flagrantemente los derechos democraticos de los habitantes surcoreanos y se depaupera la vida de ellos.
					
					Despues de la "sustitucion del poder" en el Sur de Corea, los surcoreanos de diversos estratos exigieron fuertemente la liberacion de los presos de conciencia, victimas de la represion fascista de la banda traidora de Park Geun-hye, y la cancelacion del calificativo de ilegal dado al Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes, entre otros asuntos para la libertad democratica y la recuperacion de derechos.
					
					Sin embargo, las autoridades surcoreanas rechazaron la demanda de ellos en el caso del Sindicato Nacional de Ensenantes repitiendo la opinion de los conservadores de que "si se concede el caracter legal a ese sindicato, puede crear un antecedente negativo para la poblacion". En cuanto a la exigencia de liberar a los presos de conciencia, dijeron absurdamente que no pueden "hacerlo para el congraciamiento" y "si lo hacen, los conservadores pueden exigir tambien la libertad de Park Geun-hye".
					
					Por eso, continuan permaneciendo tras las rejas el parlamentario por el ex Partido Progresista Unido, encarcelado injustamente por el "poder" de Park Geun-hye, el presidente de la Confederacion de Sindicatos Surcoreanos (CSS) y otros presos de conciencia.
					
					La oleada de confrontacion fratricida, que azota el Sur de Corea, es acompanada de la violacion flagrante de derechos humanos.
					
					Cuando las autoridades fingian traer nuevo cambio en la mejora de relaciones intercoreanas, las entidades progresistas, incluso el Consejo del Movimiento de Familiares por la Democratizacion, exigieron a aquellas la devolucion inmediata de Kim Ryon Hui y las empleadas norcoreanas, victimas de la politica de confrontacion del "poder" conservador surcoreano.
					
					Ellas apuntaron que la devolucion es la tarea que debe resolver primero el actual "gobierno" para lograr la reconciliacion y unidad de la nacion y recuperar los DDHH y la democracia perdidos.
					
					Pero, el Ministerio de Unificacion insulto a Kim Ryon Hui diciendo que ella "demanda de mala gana el regreso por la preocupacion sobre sus familiares en el Norte".
					
					Y en cuanto a las empleadas raptadas envio sin escrupulos a las entidades civiles y sociales la opinion escrita describiendo el secuestro como la "fuga voluntaria del Norte". E insatisfecho con esto, trazo el nuevo complot de "boda" para asentarlas en el Sur de Corea. 
					
					Ademas, las autoridades surcoreanas pisotean despiadadamente la aspiracion de la poblacion surcoreana a la reconciliacion y unidad nacionales, la paz y la reunificacion. 
					
					Al pronosticar el fin tragico en la lucha masiva con velas encendidas, la banda conservadora reprimio, en virtud de la infame "ley de seguridad", a los habitantes de diferentes estratos que aspiraban a la justicia y demandaban la mejora de las relaciones intercoreanas, tildandolos de "izquierdistas pro-Norte y fuerzas subordinadas al Norte" a fin de salir de la crisis. 
					
					Lo mas indignante para la poblacion surcoreana es que tales crimenes fascistas se cometen ininterrumpidamente aun despues de la sustitucion del "poder". 
					
					Se puede decir que el ejercito surcoreano, el mercenario colonial de EE.UU., es el teatro de los casos de violacion de derechos humanos.
					
					Ocurren sucesivamente las perdidas humanas debido a los ejercicios belicos anti-RPDC y se incrementan los oficiales y soldados que suplican el retiro del ejercito pretextando la enfermedad psiquica. 
					
					En el ejercito titere predomina la cultura de cuartel al estilo yanqui que considera la barbaridad como el mejor temperamento del militar. Por consiguiente, la violencia se hace el modo de vida ordinaria y el medio principal para mantener el ejercito.
					
					Es mas miserable la situacion de las muchachas en el servicio militar.
					
					El problema de derechos humanos en el Sur de Corea no puede ser resuelto nunca, mientras persistan la dominacion y ocupacion coloniales por parte de EE.UU. y continuen el servilismo proyanqui y las politicas fratricidas y antipopulares de la banda titere.

articles.title: ACNC comenta medidas de Japon para la militarizacion
articles.content:
ACNC comenta medidas de Japon para la militarizacion
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En la reciente comision presupuestaria de la Camara de Consejeros, el premier japones Abe volvio a exponer el criterio de estipular en el articulo 9 de la Constitucion la existencia de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" y admitir el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva".
					Esto constituye una expresion de las cada vez mas activas maniobras de los reaccionarios japoneses para resucitar el militarismo siendo gran amenaza para la paz de la region y el resto del mundo.
					
					La ambicion de reagresion de los militaristas fanaticos llega ahora al limite intolerable.
					
					Para alcanzar la meta de liberar su pais del sistema posbelico y convertirlo en el "pais capaz de hacer la guerra", Abe utiliza ingeniosamente el tema de ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva".
					
					En el ano 2013, aprobo por primera vez en la historia politica japonesa la "estrategia de seguridad nacional" e insistio en el "aporte mas activo que antes por la paz y la estabilidad de la sociedad internacional basandose en el pacifismo activo", de manera que se preparara el marco legal para sustentar teoricamente el ejercicio del mencionado "derecho".
					
					A fin de ampliar en todos los planos el teatro de operaciones militares en ultramar de las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa", enmendo nuevamente a los 18 anos en abril de 2015 la "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon" que estipulo la cooperacion en las operaciones, informaciones y ayuda logistica y la distribucion de papeles en el tiempo de emergencia entre las tropas norteamericanas y las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa".
					
					En septiembre de 2015 aprobo la "ley de seguridad" recogiendo 11 proyectos de ley que pueden apoyar legalmente la "guia de cooperacion en defensa EE.UU.-Japon" y la puso oficialmente en vigor el 29 de marzo del 2016.
					
					Segun ella, las "Fuerzas de Autodefensa" obtuvieron el permiso de cumplir en cualquier region del mundo la mision operacional pretextando el ejercicio del "derecho a la autodefensa colectiva".
					
					A la capa gobernadora japonesa, deseosa de agredir a ultramar, le falta solo modificar la "Constitucion de paz" para procurar la "justeza" y la "legitimidad" de la conversion del pais en la potencia militar y la agresion al extranjero.
					
					Anteriormente, un medio de prensa extranjero expreso la precaucion senalando que "para Abe, el asunto del derecho a la autodefensa colectiva no pasa de ser una comida apetitosa antes de la enmienda de la Constitucion".
					
					En el acto por el 70o aniversario de la entrada en vigor de la Constitucion de Japon, Abe disparateo que "hay que modificarla ya que fue cambiado el ambiente de seguridad debido al desarrollo de armas nucleares y de misiles del Norte (de Corea)".
					
					La locura de las fuerzas derechistas, encabezadas por el premier, lleva el archipielago japones al limite peligroso.
					
					Los actos agresivos de Japon perpetrados hasta la fecha en la Peninsula Coreana y el continente asiatico terminaron siempre con la derrota amarga dejando tambien al pueblo japones las heridas dificiles de cicatrizar.
					
					Japon debe sacar lecciones de su historia de agresion.
					
					Le tocara solo el fin tragico si repite los crimenes del pasado sin despertarse de su vieja ilusion de "esfera de coprosperidad de la gran Asia Oriental".

articles.title: Minju Joson ironiza la campana de sancion anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
articles.content:
Minju Joson ironiza la campana de sancion anti-RPDC del Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 20 de diciembre (ACNC) -- En visperas de la visita del mandatario surcoreano a China, los titeres surcoreanos publicaron la definicion adicional de un organo financiero, una compania de barco y otras entidades e individuales como el "objeto de sancion independiente".
					La reiterada campana imprudente de "sancion independiente" demuestra fehacientemente la inveterada naturaleza conflictiva de la banda surcoreana de traidores a la nacion.
					
					Asi senala el periodico Minju Joson en un comentario individual divulgado hoy y prosigue:
					
					Ningunas sanciones y presiones superintransigentes de los enemigos pueden impedir la marcha de la RPDC que avanza vigorosamente por la senda de la independencia y el desarrollo paralelo.
					
					Sin embargo, los titeres hablan del "plan de sancion independiente adicional" insistiendo en la "rotunda reaccion a la provocacion del Norte de Corea" y la "peligrosidad de negocios con el Norte de Corea", lo que es una provocacion politica imperdonable contra la RPDC y un perverso desafio a la esperanza del exterior e interior que desean angustiosamente la mejora cuanto antes de las relaciones intercoreanas, extremadamente en peor, y el alivio de la situacion de la Peninsula Coreana, que esta a punto de estallar.
					
					La campana de la "sancion independiente" adicional de los titeres surcoreanos no es mas que un "tributo" de lacayo colonial.
					
					Es una sofisteria cinica la insistencia en la "sancion" adicional de los titeres surcoreanos que no tienen ningun medio ni metodo para imponer la sancion a la RPDC.
